sentence: Six  Israeli  civilians  have  died  in  cross-border  attacks  from  Lebanon,  Israeli  officials  say,  including  an  elderly  mother  and  son  killed  Sunday  by  a  pair  of  anti-tank  missile  strikes  on  their  home  in  Kfar  Yuval.

Six  Israeli  civilians  have  died  in  cross-border  attacks  from  Lebanon,  Israeli  officials  say,  including  an  elderly  mother  and  son  killed  Sunday  by  a  pair  of  anti-tank  missile  strikes  on  their  home  in  Kfar  Yuval.
The  question  has  taken  on  greater  urgency  this  month  after  a  strike  in  Lebanon's  capital  Beirut  killed  a  top  Hamas  official.

In  addition  to  the  two  civilians  killed  in  Kfar  Yuval,  attacks  from  Lebanon  in  recent  days  have  damaged  Israeli  military  infrastructure  and  injured  at  least  six  soldiers,  officials  say.
